cu.explanation_en: Setting nr_cellid to 0 is invalid as NR cell IDs must be positive non-zero values, causing cell identification failure and gNB CU startup error.

du.explanation_en: Setting nr_cellid to 0 is invalid as NR cell IDs must be positive non-zero values, causing cell identification failure and gNB DU startup error.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nr_cellid 設定為 0 無效，因為 NR 細胞 ID 必須是正的非零值，會導致細胞識別失敗並阻止 gNB DU 啟動。
